title: Enhancing biochar production: A technical analysis of the combined influence of chemical activation (KOH and NaOH) and pyrolysis atmospheres (N<sub>2</sub>/CO<sub>2</sub>) on yields and properties of rice husk-derived biochar
content:
Publication date: November 2024

Source: Journal of Environmental Management, Volume 370

Author(s): Premchand Premchand, Francesca Demichelis, Camilla Galletti, David Chiaramonti, Samir Bensaid, Elsa Antunes, Debora Fino
